The number of cycles should be high enough to provide sufficient library fragments for a successful sequencing run, but low enough to avoid PCR artifacts and over-cycling (high molecular weight fragments on Bioanalyzer). The number of PCR cycles recommended in Table 4.1 are to be seen as a starting point to determine the number of PCR cycles best for standard library prep samples. Use Table 4.2 for applications requiring high library yields (~1 μg) such as target enrichment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dfvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q457","text":"Table 4.1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cigra","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"avscl","text":"* These input ranges will work best when size selection is done ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l7mr","text":"** NEBNext adaptors contain a unique truncated design. These volumes may not work properly for a cleanup at a different step in the workflow. For cleanups of samples contained in different buffer conditions, the volumes may need to be experimentally determined.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4j1kf","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95cde","text":"Add   (0.9X) resuspended beads to the PCR reaction. Mix well by pipetting up and down at least 10 times. {"blocks":[{"key":"1on5s","text":"Air dry the beads for up to   while the tube/ plate is on the magnetic stand with the lid open.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8d89a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ag9o","text":"Caution: Do not over-dry the beads.
